name: NWProtocolFramer
desc: A customizable network protocol for defining application message parsers.

items.name: protocol NWProtocolFramerImplementation
items.desc: A protocol to which your classes can conform in order to implement a custom framing protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolFramer.Instance
items.desc: An object that represents a single instance of your custom protocol running in a connection.

items.name: class NWProtocolFramer.Definition
items.desc: A custom protocol definition you use to associate messages with protocol options.

items.name: class NWProtocolFramer.Options
items.desc: A container you use to add your custom protocol to a connection's protocol stack.

items.name: class NWProtocolFramer.Message
items.desc: A message for a custom protocol, in which you can store arbitrary key-value pairs.
